detectors.description: function isContract(address account) internal view returns (bool) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BLM.sol)#154

ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BLM.sol#63-70) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BLM.sol#67)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BLM.sol#68)

	- IERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BLM.sol#4)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BLM.sol#39-42)
	- IERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BLM.sol#8)
